dc:title: CPIC Genotype - Phenotype for CYP2D6 v0.3.0
dc:description: Genotype to Phenotype definitions for CYP2D6 according to CPIC and DPWG

schema:creator.schema:affiliation: Knowledge Systems Lab, University of Michigan Medical School

koio:hasKnowledge.dc:creator: Clinical Pharmacogenomics Implementation Consortium
Dutch Pharmacogenetics Working Group
koio:hasKnowledge.dc:description: Expert consensus for CYP2D6 phenotype definitions based on genotype

hasTest.dc:title: Knowledge Tests (Python)
hasTest.dc:description: These tests are written to test the knowledge for CYP2D6 genotype to phenotype conversion.

hasService.dc:description: A JavaScript/Python library with a function that accepts a genetic profile and provide corresponding phenotypes.

hasTest.dc:title: Service Tests (JavaScript)
hasTest.dc:description: These tests are written to test the functionality and correctness of the JavaScript library service.

hasTest.dc:title: Service Tests (Python)
hasTest.dc:description: These tests are written to test the functionality and correctness of the Python library service.
